title: Version control review system merge request reviews

merge_request_review.description: A review for a merge or pull request from a review system, such as GitHub or TFS/VSTS/Azure DevOps.
merge_request_review.$comment: All fields are strings for cross-compatibility with older importers.

reviewer.description: Name of the developer who performs the review. This may also be an account name.

reviewer_username.description: Account name of the developer who performs the review.

vote.description: The vote that the reviewer gave.
